name: Salvation of the soul (itch)
description:
DEMO

Salvation of the soul is a first-person game where you have to perform a large, complex and sequential ritual of banishing a demon in order to save a small innocent soul. You will:

- find notes with instructions that are hidden throughout the house;

- outwit the minions of the Demon, who, with any of your attempts to interfere with the Master, immediately rush into battle;

- collect all the necessary ingredients, place them in the right bowl, apply the correct circle;

- and finally place the crystal sphere in a large bowl.

    Inventory is limited! Almost no chance! But what will be stronger? Fear of death or hope for the salvation of a fragile, young soul, which still existed so little in this world.

    Download Salvation of the soul. Challenge the dark forces. Look into the eyes of death and win the battle in the eternal confrontation between Good and Evil.

You can buy the game on steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2146440/Salvation_of_the_soul/

If you find it difficult to pass, look at the manuals

https://steamcommunity.com/app/2146440/guides/
